prompts: Create a majestic canine Pokemon with fiery orange fur and sleek black stripes.
I want a powerful fire-type Pokemon that resembles a wolf and has a noble demeanor.
Generate an image of a Pokemon with a flowing mane and a fierce look, perfect for battle.
Make a detailed design of a Pokemon that embodies loyalty and courage with bright flames.
Imagine a Pokemon that roams the grasslands, showcasing its orange and cream colors.
Show me a fierce-looking quadruped Pokemon with striking patterns and a confident stance.
Design a Pokemon that blends elegance and power, featuring warm tones and strong presence.
